name: WarPath 3000
description:
WarPath 3000 is an arcade scroll shooter game with futuristic 3D graphics. One of the main features of the game, which distinguishes it from other similar shooters - a variety of military vehicles, which you can controls. All levels in the game divided into three storylines. You should fly on a plane and helicopter, killing hordes of enemies. Ride in an armored car and a rocket launcher, avoiding accurate and rapid-fire guns. Swim on the ship and destroyer striking surface and underwater targets. The game can captivate both of novice and advanced gamers.

→ Main Feature WarPath 3000:

● Colorful 3D levels
● 3 storylines
● 6 types of available vehicles
● Upgrades for each vehicle
● A huge army of various enemies
● Star bonuses for purchase vehicles and upgrades
● Intuitive touch control
● Long hours of gameplay
